reviewText: It was a fun game, and if you like hidden object games you will probably enjoy it. However it is jaw-droppingly short, and there is no plot. Expensive for what it was.

reviewText: Just another typical hidden object puzzle game. Only this one is much more challenging (ex: time limit) than the ones I played in the past. Most certainly recommend this to any puzzle solver looking for a more intimidating challenge.
